# react pdf
PDF preview compoent using pdfJS

#### Install

```sh
npm install react-pdf-preview --save
```

or using yarn

```sh
yarn add react-pdf-preview
```



&nbsp;

#### usage

```js
import React, { Component } from "react";
import PdfPreview from "react-pdf-preview";

class Preview extends Component {
    render () {
        return (
            <PdfPreview src={<URL>} />
        )
    }
}
```

&nbsp;
